ModMetaData.name: Increased Max Gods in Theist Religions
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Changes the maximum number of gods you can add to abstract and embodied theistic religions from 4 to 20. This allows you to add a lot more gods to your list. You can't go full greek mythology, but 20 is still a lot.
